definition: to slink/to move stealthily/to advance through the water

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: "Sap" no longer removes you from stealth when used.
sentences.chinese: “闷棍”不再在使用后将你移出的潜行状态。

sentences.english: You mean sneak past them somehow ?
sentences.chinese: 你是说想办法潜行过去？

sentences.english: Same faction players in stealth are seeable by any other player of that faction.
sentences.chinese: 潜行玩家对同阵营的其他玩家可见。

sentences.english: The lurker is good for players with patience.
sentences.chinese: 潜行者很适用于有耐性的玩家。

sentences.english: Wolves prowled the forest in search of prey .
Usually the best tactic is to sneak around and take them out in one blow, one by one.
sentences.chinese: 通常最佳战术是潜行作战，将敌人一个一个击败。

sentences.english: The addict prowled about for a place to drug up.
sentences.chinese: 瘾君子到处潜行找个地方吸毒。

sentences.english: Covert Ops plays a more stealth role with the aid of a sniper rifle.
sentences.chinese: 潜行者作为一个秘密行动角色，擅长使用狙击枪。

sentences.english: Sneakattacks do 6x damage with one-handed weapons.
sentences.chinese: 潜行攻击时用单手武器获得6倍伤害。

sentences.english: Backstab now has a Sneak pre-req (before Mage-Assassins could get Backstab before they had Sneak).
sentences.chinese: 背刺现在有潜行等级要求才能学习。

sentences.english: The prowess and endowment are the prowler's wager to the dowdy dowager.
sentences.chinese: 英勇和禀赋是潜行者下给衣衫褴褛的富孀的赌注。

sentences.english: I hereby award you the title Master Prowler . In addition…
sentences.chinese: 我在此正式授予你潜行大师的称号。

sentences.english: Fiends of Darkness are able to hide in the night and are stealthy.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗魔能在黑夜隐蔽自己，有潜行的能力。
然后有一位潜行的不速之客来访了。

sentences.english: I believe that rogues in 2v2 have a variety of viable combinations.
sentences.chinese: 我认为2V2中的潜行者有种类繁多的组合。

definition: to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge
to hide oneself/invisible (person or online status)
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
